title: Functions and methods for working with AST tree
content:
I am implementing deep search with Python Hex Ray API.
Can someone say classes and methods for implementing this feature with the IDA Python API?

answers_data.content: Hex-Rays’ version of AST is called “ctree”, so you can search for the term in hexrays.hpp to see what methods are available, as well as in the sample plugins and scripts.
